title: Part A - computeBonusThreshold  method (5 points)
stimulusHtml:
Points earned:

+1 [Skill 3.D] Accesses all elements in itemsSold MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGPbGaaeiDaiaabwgacaqGTbGaae4CaiaabofacaqGVbGaaeiB aiaabsgaaaa@3E65@

Note that general penalty v can only be incurred once, even if the error is made multiple times.

+1 [Skill 3.D] Determines minimum value in itemsSold MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGPbGaaeiDaiaabwgacaqGTbGaae4CaiaabofacaqGVbGaaeiB aiaabsgaaaa@3E65@

Response earns this point, but incurs general penalty v below if it...

• confuses array access with collection access

Response earns this point, but incurs general penalty x below if it...

• uses a variable for the minimum without declaring it

Note that general penalties v and x can only be incurred once, even if the error is made multiple times.

+1 [Skill 3.D] Determines maximum value in itemsSold MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGPbGaaeiDaiaabwgacaqGTbGaae4CaiaabofacaqGVbGaaeiB aiaabsgaaaa@3E65@

Response earns this point, but incurs general penalty v below if it...

• confuses array access with collection access

Response earns this point, but incurs general penalty x below if it...

• uses a variable for the maximum without declaring it

Note that general penalties v and x can only be incurred once, even if the error is made multiple times.

+1 [Skill 3.C] Computes the threshold from elements in itemsSold MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGPbGaaeiDaiaabwgacaqGTbGaae4CaiaabofacaqGVbGaaeiB aiaabsgaaaa@3E65@ .

Responses earn this point if...

· the threshold is computed as the average of all but the maximum and minimum elements of itemsSold Alt Text: itemsSold, even if the result is not properly cast to a double Alt Text: double.

+1 [Skill 3.C] Returns the correct threshold as a double MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGKbGaae4BaiaabwhacaqGIbGaaeiBaiaabwgaaaa@3BA3@ .

Responses earn this point if...

· the correct threshold is computed, in which the cast to double occurs before the division so that floating point division is performed instead of integer division

General Penalties:

-1 (v) Array/collection access confusion ( [] get MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaae4waiaab2 faqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaabccacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshaaaa@3B40@ )

-1 (w) Extraneous code that causes side-effect (e.g., printing to output, incorrect precondition check)

-1 (x) Local variables used but none declared

-1 (y) Destruction of persistent data (e.g., changing value referenced by parameter)

Canonical Solution:
descriptions: itemsSold MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGPbGaaeiDaiaabwgacaqGTbGaae4CaiaabofacaqGVbGaaeiB aiaabsgaaaa@3E65@ Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is less than or equal to 0.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 1.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 2.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 3.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 4.
Total number of points earned (minus penalties) is equal to 5.

title: Part B - computeWage method (4 points)
stimulusHtml:
Points earned:

+1 [Skill 3.A] Correct call to computeBonusThreshold MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqGJbGaae4Baiaab2gacaqGWbGaaeyDaiaabshacaqGLbGaaeOq aiaab+gacaqGUbGaaeyDaiaabohacaqGubGaaeiAaiaabkhacaqGLb Gaae4CaiaabIgacaqGVbGaaeiBaiaabsgaaaa@4986@

Response earns this point, but incurs general penalty x below if it...

• uses a variable for the threshold without declaring it

+1 [Skill 3.C] Differentiate computation of wage based on bonus threshold.

Response earns this point, but incurs general penalty v below if it...

• confuses array access with collection access

Note that general penalty v can only be incurred once, even if the error is made multiple times.

+1 [Skill 3.D] Assign to a wages MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqG3bGaaeyyaiaabEgacaqGLbGaae4Caaaa@3ABC@ element with a correctly computed wage.

Response earns this point, but incurs general penalty v below if it...

• confuses array access with collection access

Note that general penalty v can only be incurred once, even if the error is made multiple times.

+1 [Skill 3.D] Compute all wages and assign them to wages MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaqG3bGaaeyyaiaabEgacaqGLbGaae4Caaaa@3ABC@ .

Response earns this point, but incurs general penalty v below if it...

• confuses array access with collection access

Response earns this point, but incurs general penalty z below if it...

• returns a value from the method

Note that general penalty v can only be incurred once, even if the error is made multiple times.

General Penalties:

-1 (v) Array/collection access confusion ( [] get MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaae4waiaab2 faqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaabccacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshaaaa@3B40@ )

-1 (w) Extraneous code that causes side-effect (e.g., printing to output, incorrect precondition check)

-1 (x) Local variables used but none declared

-1 (y) Destruction of persistent data (e.g., changing value referenced by parameter)

-1 (z) Void method or constructor that returns a value
